title: Radio: UX consistent dont
code:
<gds-flex padding="xl">
  <gds-radio-group label="How do you want the goods delivered?" value="1">
    <gds-radio label="Home delivery" value="1"></gds-radio>
    <gds-radio
      label="I want to pick up the package in the store"
      value="2"
    ></gds-radio>
    <gds-radio label="Collect from parcel locker" value="3"></gds-radio>
    <gds-radio label="express delivery" value="4"></gds-radio>
  </gds-radio-group>
</gds-flex>
